Sequence Information.Peptide Name: OTAP-92 (fragment of ovotransferrin, synthetic AMPs20, 3S=S; UCSS1a; BBMm)
Sequence Information.Source: acid cleaved natural fragment, Sequence truncation, animal-derived, natural derivative
Sequence Information.Function: Active against S. aureus and E. coli.
Sequence Information.Mechanism of action: bacteria:E. coli: Permeated E. coli membranes.

Literature.Author: Ibrahim HR, Iwamori E, Sugimoto Y, Aoki T. 1998
Literature.Title: Identification of a distinct antibacterial domain within the N-lobe of ovotransferrin

Sequence Information.Comments: Chemical modification:  Three S-S bonds: Cys115–Cys197, Cys160–Cys174, and Cys171–Cys182.
